name: FNF FPS
description:
Friday Night Funkin' goes 3D in FNF FPS, a first/third-person shooter inspired by the coolest music rhythm game ever.

It's not the most perfect first/third-person shooter in the world so don't expect it to be glitchless, flawless, etc. Thanks for playing!

Please, share the game with your friends if you like it. The more gameplay sessions, the more chances that we develop something else :D

>> CLICK HERE TO PLAY MORE [FNF] GAMES <<

  • [W-A-S-D] Move  
  • [LMB] Shoot  
  • [RMB] Aim
  • [G] Toss grenade  
  • [T] Slow-mo aka bullet-time
  • [R] Reload  
  • [Shift] Run  
  • [Space] Jump  
  • [C] Switch between first-person and third-person
